get.description: This endpoint can be used to obtain account summary information.

spotSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with spot trading permissions enabled

marginSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with margin trading permissions enabled

futuresSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with futures trading permissions enabled

optionSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with option trading permissions enabled

maxSubQuantity.description: Max number of sub-accounts = maxDefaultSubQuantity + maxSpotSubQuantity

maxDefaultSubQuantity.description: Max number of default open sub-accounts (according to VIP level)

maxSpotSubQuantity.description: Max number of sub-accounts with additional Spot trading permissions

maxMarginSubQuantity.description: Max number of sub-accounts with additional margin trading permissions

maxFuturesSubQuantity.description: Max number of sub-accounts with additional futures trading permissions

maxOptionSubQuantity.description: Max number of sub-accounts with additional Option trading permissions

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to obtain account summary information.

get.description: Get the information of the api key. Use the api key pending to be checked to call the endpoint. Both master and sub user's api key are applicable.

permission.description: [Permissions](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338144),  possible values: General, Spot, Margin, Futures, InnerTransfer, Transfer, Earn

isMaster.description: Whether it is the master account.

subName.description: Sub Name, There is no such param for the master account

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get the information of the api key. Use the api key pending to be checked to call the endpoint. Both master and sub user's api key are applicable.

get.description: This interface determines whether the current user is a spot high-frequency user or a spot low-frequency user.

data.description: Spot account type. True means the current user is a high-frequency spot user, False means the current user is a low-frequency spot user

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface determines whether the current user is a spot high-frequency user or a spot low-frequency user.

get.description: Get a list of accounts. Please Deposit to the main account firstly, then transfer the funds to the trade account via Inner Transfer before transaction.

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use)

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get a list of accounts. Please Deposit to the main account firstly, then transfer the funds to the trade account via Inner Transfer before transaction.

get.description: get Information for a single spot account. Use this endpoint when you know the accountId.

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use)

get.x-sdk-method-description: get Information for a single spot account. Use this endpoint when you know the accountId.

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the cross margin account.

parameters.name: quoteCurrency
parameters.description: quote currency, currently only supports USDT, KCS, BTC, USDT as default

parameters.name: queryType
parameters.description: Query account type (default MARGIN), MARGIN - only query low frequency cross margin account, MARGIN_V2-only query high frequency cross margin account, ALL - consistent aggregate query with the web side

status.description: Position status; EFFECTIVE-effective, BANKRUPTCY-bankruptcy liquidation, LIQUIDATION-closing, REPAY-repayment, BORROW borrowing

maxBorrowSize.description: The user's remaining maximum loan amount

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the cross margin account.

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the isolated margin account.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: For isolated trading pairs, query all without passing

parameters.name: quoteCurrency
parameters.description: quote currency, currently only supports USDT, KCS, BTC, USDT as default

parameters.name: queryType
parameters.description: Query account type (default ISOLATED), ISOLATED- - only query low frequency isolated margin account, ISOLATED_V2-only query high frequency isolated margin account, ALL - consistent aggregate query with the web side

status.description: Position status; EFFECTIVE-effective, BANKRUPTCY-bankruptcy liquidation, LIQUIDATION-closing, REPAY-repayment, BORROW borrowing

maxBorrowSize.description: The user's remaining maximum loan amount
The user's remaining maximum loan amount

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the isolated margin account.

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the futures account.

marginBalance.description: Margin balance = positionMargin + orderMargin + frozenFunds + availableBalance - unrealisedPNL

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the futures account.

get.description: This interface is for transaction records from all types of your accounts, supporting inquiry of various currencies. Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency ( you can choose more than one currency). You can specify 10 currencies at most for one time. If not specified, all currencies will be inquired by default.

parameters.name: bizType
parameters.description: Type: DEPOSIT -deposit, WITHDRAW -withdraw, TRANSFER -transfer, SUB_TRANSFER -subaccount transfer,TRADE_EXCHANGE -trade, MARGIN_EXCHANGE -margin trade, KUCOIN_BONUS -bonus, BROKER_TRANSFER -Broker transfer record

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results per request. Minimum is 10, maximum is 500.

amount.description: The total amount of assets (fees included) involved in assets changes such as transaction, withdrawal and bonus distribution.

fee.description: Fees generated in transaction, withdrawal, etc.

accountType.description: The account type of the master user: MAIN, TRADE, MARGIN or CONTRACT.

bizType.description: Business type leading to the changes in funds, such as exchange, withdrawal, deposit, KUCOIN_BONUS, REFERRAL_BONUS, Lendings etc.

context.description: Business related information such as order ID, serial No., etc.

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface is for transaction records from all types of your accounts, supporting inquiry of various currencies. Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.

get.description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency trading account and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and id.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency ( you can choose more than one currency). You can specify 10 currencies at most for one time. If not specified, all currencies will be inquired by default.

parameters.name: lastId
parameters.description: The id of the last set of data from the previous batch of data. By default, the latest information is given.

balance.description: Total balance of funds after change

bizType.description: Trnasaction type，such as TRANSFER, TRADE_EXCHANGE, etc.

direction.description: Direction of transfer( out or in)

get.x-sdk-method-description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency trading account and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and id.

get.description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency margin trading account and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and id.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: currency, optional，can select more than one，separate with commas，select no more than 10 currencys，the default will be to query for all currencys if left empty

parameters.name: bizType
parameters.description: Transaction type: TRANSFER- transfer funds, MARGIN_EXCHANGE - cross margin trade, ISOLATED_EXCHANGE - isolated margin trade, LIQUIDATION - liquidation, ASSERT_RETURN - forced liquidation asset return

parameters.name: lastId
parameters.description: The id of the last set of data from the previous batch of data. By default, the latest information is given.

balance.description: Total balance of funds after change

bizType.description: Trnasaction type，such as TRANSFER, TRADE_EXCHANGE, etc.

direction.description: Direction of transfer( out or in)

get.x-sdk-method-description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency margin trading account and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and id.

get.description: This interface can query the ledger records of the futures business line

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency of transaction history, XBT or USDT

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type RealisedPNL-Realised profit and loss, Deposit-Deposit, Withdrawal-withdraw, Transferin-Transfer in, TransferOut-Transfer out

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Start offset. Generally, the only attribute of the last returned result of the previous request is used, and the first page is returned by default

parameters.name: forward
parameters.description: This parameter functions to judge whether the lookup is forward or not. True means “yes” and False means “no”. This parameter is set as true by default

parameters.name: maxCount
parameters.description: Displayed size per page. The default size is 50

type.description: Type: RealisedPNL, Deposit, Withdrawal, TransferIn, TransferOut

hasMore.description: Is it the last page. If it is false, it means it is the last page, and if it is true, it means need to turn the page.

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface can query the ledger records of the futures business line

post.description: This endpoint can be used to create sub-accounts.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to create sub-accounts.

password.description: Password(7-24 characters, must contain letters and numbers, cannot only contain numbers or include special characters)

subName.description: Sub-account name(must contain 7-32 characters, at least one number and one letter. Cannot contain any spaces.)

access.description: Permission (types include Spot, Futures, Margin permissions, which can be used alone or in combination).

post.description: This endpoint can be used to add sub-accounts Margin permission. Before using this endpoints, you need to ensure that the master account apikey has Margin permissions and the Margin function has been activated.

post.description: This endpoint can be used to add sub-accounts Futures permission. Before using this endpoints, you need to ensure that the master account apikey has Futures permissions and the Futures function has been activated.

parameters.description: Number of results per request. Minimum is 1, maximum is 100, default is 10.

openedTradeTypes.description: Subaccount active permissions,If do not have the corresponding permissions, need to log in to the sub-account and go to the corresponding web page to activate

post.description: Request via this endpoint to create a deposit address for a currency you intend to deposit.

memo.description: Address remark. If there’s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to the KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). If you do not fill memo (tag), your deposit may not be available, please be cautious.

to.description: Deposit account type: main (funding account), trade (spot trading account)

expirationDate.description: Expiration time, Lightning network expiration time, non-Lightning network this field is invalid

post.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to create a deposit address for a currency you intend to deposit.

chain.description: The chainId of currency, e.g. The available value for USDT are OMNI, ERC20, TRC20, default is ERC20. The available value for BTC are Native, Segwit, TRC20, the parameters are bech32, btc, trx, default is Native. This only apply for multi-chain currency, and there is no need for single chain currency.

to.description: Deposit account type: main (funding account), trade (spot trading account), the default is main

amount.description: Deposit amount. This parameter is only used when applying for invoices on the Lightning Network. This parameter is invalid if it is not passed through the Lightning Network.

get.description: Get all deposit addresses for the currency you intend to deposit. If the returned data is empty, you may need to Add Deposit Address first.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Deposit amount. This parameter is only used when applying for invoices on the Lightning Network. This parameter is invalid if it is not passed through the Lightning Network.

memo.description: Address remark. If there’s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to the KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). If you do not fill memo (tag), your deposit may not be available, please be cautious.

to.description: Deposit account type: main (funding account), trade (spot trading account)

expirationDate.description: Expiration time, Lightning network expiration time, non-Lightning network this field is invalid

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get all deposit addresses for the currency you intend to deposit. If the returned data is empty, you may need to Add Deposit Address first.

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get deposit list Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status. Available value: PROCESSING, SUCCESS, and FAILURE

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results per request. Minimum is 10, maximum is 500.

memo.description: Address remark. If there’s no remark, it is empty.

createdAt.description: Creation time of the database record

updatedAt.description: Update time of the database record

arrears.description: Whether there is any debt.A quick rollback will cause the deposit to fail. If the deposit fails, you will need to repay the balance.

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get deposit list Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.

    "code": "200000",
    "data": {
        "currentPage": 1,
        "pageSize": 50,
        "totalNum": 5,
        "totalPage": 1,
        "items": [
            {
                "currency": "USDT",
                "chain": "",
                "status": "SUCCESS",
                "address": "a435*****@gmail.com",
                "memo": "",
                "isInner": true,
                "amount": "1.00000000",
                "fee": "0.00000000",
                "walletTxId": null,
                "createdAt": 1728555875000,
                "updatedAt": 1728555875000,
                "remark": "",
                "arrears": false
            },
            {
                "currency": "USDT",
                "chain": "trx",
                "status": "SUCCESS",
                "address": "TSv3L1fS7******X4nLP6rqNxYz",
                "memo": "",
                "isInner": true,
                "amount": "6.00000000",
                "fee": "0.00000000",
                "walletTxId": null,
                "createdAt": 1721730920000,
                "updatedAt": 1721730920000,
                "remark": "",
                "arrears": false
            }
        ]
    }
}

get.description: This interface can obtain the withdrawal quotas information of this currency.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: The chainId of currency, e.g. The available value for USDT are OMNI, ERC20, TRC20, default is ERC20. The available value for BTC are Native, Segwit, TRC20, the parameters are bech32, btc, trx, default is Native. This only apply for multi-chain currency, and there is no need for single chain currency.

limitQuotaCurrencyAmount.description: The intraday available withdrawal amount(withdrawal limit currency)

usedQuotaCurrencyAmount.description: The intraday cumulative withdrawal amount(withdrawal limit currency)

remainAmount.description: Remaining amount available to withdraw the current day

isWithdrawEnabled.description: Is the withdraw function enabled or not

lockedAmount.description: Total locked amount (including the amount locked into USDT for each currency)

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface can obtain the withdrawal quotas information of this currency.

post.description: Use this interface to withdraw the specified currency

withdrawalId.description: Withdrawal id, a unique ID for a withdrawal

post.x-sdk-method-description: Use this interface to withdraw the specified currency

chain.description: The chainId of currency, For a currency with multiple chains, it is recommended to specify chain parameter instead of using the default chain; you can query the chainId through the response of the GET /api/v3/currencies/{currency} interface.

amount.description: Withdrawal amount, a positive number which is a multiple of the amount precision

memo.description: Address remark. If there’s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to the KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). If you do not fill memo (tag), your deposit may not be available, please be cautious.

isInner.description: Internal withdrawal or not. Default : false

feeDeductType.description:
Withdrawal fee deduction type: INTERNAL or EXTERNAL or not specified

1. INTERNAL- deduct the transaction fees from your withdrawal amount
2. EXTERNAL- deduct the transaction fees from your main account
3. If you don't specify the feeDeductType parameter, when the balance in your main account is sufficient to support the withdrawal, the system will initially deduct the transaction fees from your main account. But if the balance in your main account is not sufficient to support the withdrawal, the system will deduct the fees from your withdrawal amount. For example: Suppose you are going to withdraw 1 BTC from the KuCoin platform (transaction fee: 0.0001BTC), if the balance in your main account is insufficient, the system will deduct the transaction fees from your withdrawal amount. In this case, you will be receiving 0.9999BTC.

withdrawType.description: Withdrawal type, ADDRESS (withdrawal address), UID, MAIL (email), PHONE (mobile phone number). Note: If you withdraw by uid/mail/phone, there will have rate limited: 3 times/10 seconds, 50 times/24 hours (calculated on a rolling basis based on the first request time)

delete.description: This interface can cancel the withdrawal, Only withdrawals requests of PROCESSING status could be canceled.

parameters.name: withdrawalId
parameters.description: Path parameter, a unique ID for a withdrawalId

delete.x-sdk-method-description: This interface can cancel the withdrawal, Only withdrawals requests of PROCESSING status could be canceled.

createdAt.description: Creation time of the database record

updatedAt.description: Update time of the database record

                "memo": "",

                "amount": "1.00000000",
                "fee": "0.00000000",
                "walletTxId": null,
                "createdAt": 1728555875000,
                "updatedAt": 1728555875000,
                "remark": "",
                "arrears": false
            },
            {
                "currency": "USDT",
                "chain": "trx",
                "status": "SUCCESS",
                "address": "TSv3L1fS7******X4nLP6rqNxYz",
                "memo": "",
                "isInner": true,
                "amount": "6.00000000",
                "fee": "0.00000000",
                "walletTxId": null,

post.description: Use this interface to withdraw the specified currency

withdrawalId.description: Withdrawal id, a unique ID for a withdrawal

post.x-sdk-method-description: Use this interface to withdraw the specified currency

chain.description: The chainId of currency, For a currency with multiple chains, it is recommended to specify chain parameter instead of using the default chain; you can query the chainId through the response of the GET /api/v3/currencies/{currency} interface.

amount.description: Withdrawal amount, a positive number which is a multiple of the amount precision

memo.description: Address remark. If there’s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to the KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). If you do not fill memo (tag), your deposit may not be available, please be cautious.

isInner.description: Internal withdrawal or not. Default : false

feeDeductType.description:
Withdrawal fee deduction type: INTERNAL or EXTERNAL or not specified

1. INTERNAL- deduct the transaction fees from your withdrawal amount
2. EXTERNAL- deduct the transaction fees from your main account
3. If you don't specify the feeDeductType parameter, when the balance in your main account is sufficient to support the withdrawal, the system will initially deduct the transaction fees from your main account. But if the balance in your main account is not sufficient to support the withdrawal, the system will deduct the fees from your withdrawal amount. For example: Suppose you are going to withdraw 1 BTC from the KuCoin platform (transaction fee: 0.0001BTC), if the balance in your main account is insufficient, the system will deduct the transaction fees from your withdrawal amount. In this case, you will be receiving 0.9999BTC.

get.description: This endpoint returns the transferable balance of a specified account.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Trading pair, required when the account type is ISOLATED; other types are not passed, e.g.: BTC-USDT

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade.

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use).

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint returns the transferable balance of a specified account.

post.description: This interface can be used for transfers between master and sub accounts and inner transfers
post.x-sdk-method-description: This interface can be used for transfers between master and sub accounts and inner transfers

clientOid.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, e.g. UUID, with a maximum length of 128 bits

amount.description: Transfer amount, the amount is a positive integer multiple of the currency precision.

fromUserId.description: Transfer out UserId， This is required when transferring sub-account to master-account. It is optional for internal transfers.

fromAccountTag.description: Symbol, required when the account type is ISOLATED or ISOLATED_V2, for example: BTC-USDT

type.description: Transfer type：INTERNAL(Transfer within account)、PARENT_TO_SUB(Transfer from master-account to sub-account)，SUB_TO_PARENT(Transfer from sub-account to master-account)

toUserId.description: Transfer in UserId， This is required when transferring master-account to sub-account. It is optional for internal transfers.

toAccountTag.description: Symbol, required when the account type is ISOLATED or ISOLATED_V2, for example: BTC-USDT

get.description: This interface is for the spot/margin basic fee rate of users

parameters.name: currencyType
parameters.description: Currency type: 0-crypto currency, 1-fiat currency. default is 0-crypto currency

get.description: This interface is for the actual fee rate of the trading pair. You can inquire about fee rates of 10 trading pairs each time at most. The fee rate of your sub-account is the same as that of the master account.

parameters.description: Trading pair (optional, you can inquire fee rates of 10 trading pairs each time at most)

symbol.description: The unique identity of the trading pair and will not change even if the trading pair is renamed

takerFeeRate.description: Actual taker fee rate of the symbol

makerFeeRate.description: Actual maker fee rate of the symbol

makerFeeRate.description: Actual maker fee rate of the trading pair

patch.x-sdk-method-description: This interface is for the actual futures fee rate of the trading pair. The fee rate of your sub-account is the same as that of the master account.

to.description: Deposit account type: main (funding account), trade (spot trading account)

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get all deposit addresses for the currency you intend to deposit. If the returned data is empty, you may need to Add Deposit Address first.

post.description: Funds in the main account, trading account and margin account of a Master Account can be transferred to the main account, trading account, futures account and margin account of its Sub-Account. The futures account of both the Master Account and Sub-Account can only accept funds transferred in from the main account, trading account and margin account and cannot transfer out to these accounts.
post.x-sdk-method-description: Funds in the main account, trading account and margin account of a Master Account can be transferred to the main account, trading account, futures account and margin account of its Sub-Account. The futures account of both the Master Account and Sub-Account can only accept funds transferred in from the main account, trading account and margin account and cannot transfer out to these accounts.

clientOid.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, e.g. UUID, with a maximum length of 128 bits

amount.description: Transfer amount, the amount is a positive integer multiple of the currency precision.

direction.description:
OUT — the master user to sub user
IN — the sub user to the master user.

subUserId.description: the user ID of a sub-account.

post.description: This API endpoint can be used to transfer funds between accounts internally. Users can transfer funds between their account free of charge.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This API endpoint can be used to transfer funds between accounts internally. Users can transfer funds between their account free of charge.

clientOid.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, e.g. UUID, with a maximum length of 128 bits

amount.description: Transfer amount, the amount is a positive integer multiple of the currency precision.

to.description: Receiving Account Type: main, trade, margin, isolated, margin_v2, isolated_v2, contract

fromTag.description: Trading pair, required when the payment account type is isolated, e.g.: BTC-USDT

toTag.description: Trading pair, required when the payment account type is isolated, e.g.: BTC-USDT

from.description: Payment Account Type: main, trade, margin, isolated, margin_v2, isolated_v2

post.description: The amount to be transferred will be deducted from the KuCoin Futures Account. Please ensure that you have sufficient funds in your KuCoin Futures Account, or the transfer will fail.

status.description: Status:APPLY, PROCESSING, PENDING_APPROVAL, APPROVED, REJECTED, PENDING_CANCEL, CANCEL, SUCCESS

post.x-sdk-method-description: The amount to be transferred will be deducted from the KuCoin Futures Account. Please ensure that you have sufficient funds in your KuCoin Futures Account, or the transfer will fail.

amount.description: Amount to be transfered out, the maximum cannot exceed 1000000000

post.description: The amount to be transferred will be deducted from the payAccount. Please ensure that you have sufficient funds in your payAccount Account, or the transfer will fail.
post.x-sdk-method-description: The amount to be transferred will be deducted from the payAccount. Please ensure that you have sufficient funds in your payAccount Account, or the transfer will fail.

get.description: Get all deposit addresses for the currency you intend to deposit. If the returned data is empty, you may need to Add Deposit Address first.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: The chainId of currency, e.g. The available value for USDT are OMNI, ERC20, TRC20, default is ERC20. The available value for BTC are Native, Segwit, TRC20, the parameters are bech32, btc, trx, default is Native. This only apply for multi-chain currency, and there is no need for single chain currency.

memo.description: Address remark. If there’s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to the KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). If you do not fill memo (tag), your deposit may not be available, please be cautious.

to.description: Deposit account type: main (funding account), trade (spot trading account)

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get all deposit addresses for the currency you intend to deposit. If the returned data is empty, you may need to Add Deposit Address first.

post.description: Request via this endpoint to create a deposit address for a currency you intend to deposit.

memo.description: Address remark. If there’s no remark, it is empty. When you withdraw from other platforms to the KuCoin, you need to fill in memo(tag). If you do not fill memo (tag), your deposit may not be available, please be cautious.

to.description: Deposit account type: main (funding account), trade (spot trading account)

post.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to create a deposit address for a currency you intend to deposit.

chain.description: The chainId of currency, e.g. The available value for USDT are OMNI, ERC20, TRC20, default is ERC20. The available value for BTC are Native, Segwit, TRC20, the parameters are bech32, btc, trx, default is Native. This only apply for multi-chain currency, and there is no need for single chain currency.

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the V1 historical deposits list on KuCoin. The return value is the data after Pagination, sorted in descending order according to time.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status. Available value: PROCESSING, SUCCESS, and FAILURE

createAt.description: Creation time of the database record

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the V1 historical deposits list on KuCoin. The return value is the data after Pagination, sorted in descending order according to time.

get.summary: Get Futures Account Transfer Out Ledger
get.description: This endpoint can get futures account transfer out ledger

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: Current request page, The default currentPage is 1

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can get futures account transfer out ledger

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get deposit list Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status. Available value: PROCESSING, SUCCESS, and FAILURE

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results per request. Minimum is 10, maximum is 500.

createAt.description: Creation time of the database record

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get deposit list Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the margin account.

holdBalance.description: Funds on hold in the account

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the margin account.

get.summary: Get Account List - Isolated Margin - V1
get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info list of the isolated margin account.

parameters.name: balanceCurrency
parameters.description: quote currency, currently only supports USDT, KCS, BTC, USDT as default

totalConversionBalance.description: The total balance of the isolated margin account(in the request coin)

liabilityConversionBalance.description: Total liabilities of the isolated margin account(in the request coin)

status.description: The position status: Existing liabilities-DEBT, No liabilities-CLEAR, Bankrupcy (after position enters a negative balance)-BANKRUPTCY, Existing borrowings-IN_BORROW, Existing repayments-IN_REPAY, Under liquidation-IN_LIQUIDATION, Under auto-renewal assets-IN_AUTO_RENEW .

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info list of the isolated margin account.

get.summary: Get Account Detail - Isolated Margin - V1
get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the isolated margin account.

status.description: The position status: Existing liabilities-DEBT, No liabilities-CLEAR, Bankrupcy (after position enters a negative balance)-BANKRUPTCY, Existing borrowings-IN_BORROW, Existing repayments-IN_REPAY, Under liquidation-IN_LIQUIDATION, Under auto-renewal assets-IN_AUTO_RENEW .

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the isolated margin account.
